title: 如何舉報在美國散佈仇恨言論的小粉紅？能否向公司舉報？
contents:

有無辦法向警察或Bloomberg公司檢具他的仇恨言論？有無Bloomberg公司台灣籍員工組織？請大家幫忙！


https://www.linkedin.com/in/guang-xu-ba2028114/
https://www.reddit.com/user/CStechnerd/

此人因為家暴被逮捕過：

https://www.reddit.com/r/AskNYC/comments/bdz9cq/get_fired_because_arrest_without_no_charge_or/

Get fired because arrest without no charge or conviction
https://www.redditstatic.com/desktop2x/img/renderTimingPixel.png
I recently got arrested and fingerprinted because some personal drama that I quarreled with my spouse and got reported to 911. We are both foreigners and never know the consequence of calling 911, and we were both totally freaked out. I was released the second day without charge or conviction. There's NO follow-up at all.

The tricky part is, I just got a job offer from a leading fintech at New York. I haven't started background check by this company, yet this company has already filed H1B VISA application for me. I consulted an attorney and as suggested I updated the law firm with my arrest issue, and law firm then sent this info to the company for further analysis.

I've read a lot related laws and regulations about employment at New York. It seems to me arrest without charge/conviction should be fine at least in New York? But I won't stop worrying until I pass the background check. I'm very well educated and extremely nice and super cautious person, and I could never imagine such humiliation of being put into jail for one night under the name of "Assault".

So Questions:

  1. Will NYC employers (esp. leading fintech) consider my arrest record They'll simply discard this or will call me to explain or directly make decision
  2. If they consider arrest record, will they fire me based on this arrest record
  3. Will they withdraw the H1B application for me

Many thanks!
